action.title: Angel and the Badman
action.description: Outlaw Quirt Evans is nursed back to health by a Quaker family and reconsiders his life of violence.

action.title: Pursued
action.description: An orphan raised in a foster family is haunted by violent memories and must uncover the truth.

action.title: Stage Coach
action.description: A group of strangers journey through dangerous territory in a stagecoach.

action.title: Train
action.description: A French resistance fighter tries to prevent a train carrying stolen art from reaching Germany.

action.title: State Secret
action.description: A surgeon is hunted after operating on a dictator and uncovering a deadly conspiracy.

action.title: The Batman
action.description: A relentless vigilante uncovers deep-rooted corruption in Gotham City while pursuing a sadistic serial killer known as the Riddler.

action.title: DOA Movie
action.description: In this classic film noir, tax accountant Frank Bigelow (Edmond O’Brien) discovers he's been poisoned with a slow-acting toxin and has only 24 hours to live. Determined to find his own killer, he embarks on a frantic search through San Francisco's underworld, uncovering a web of corruption and deceit.

action.title: Atomic Submarine
action.description: The Atomic Submarine is a 1959 independently made, American black-and-white science-fiction film directed by Spencer Gordon Bennet and starring Arthur Franz, Dick Foran, Brett Halsey, Joi Lansing and Jean Moorhead, with John Hilliard as the voice of the alien. The film was produced by Alex Gordon and distributed by Allied Artists Pictures Corporation.

adventure.title: Captain Kidd
adventure.description: In this swashbuckling adventure, pirate William Kidd (Charles Laughton) deceives King William III into granting him a privateer commission to escort a treasure-laden ship.

adventure.title: The New Adventures of Tarzan
adventure.description: Tarzan (Herman Brix), portrayed as a cultured and educated gentleman, embarks on a journey to Guatemala to rescue his friend D'Arnot. Alongside Ula Vale (Ula Holt) and Major Martling, he seeks the Green Goddess idol, which holds a powerful explosive formula and a fortune in jewels.

adventure.title: Mr Robinson Crusoe
adventure.description: In this comedic adventure, playboy yachtsman Steve Drexel (Douglas Fairbanks) accepts a bet to survive alone on a deserted island. Using only a toothbrush and his wits, he builds a lavish "Park Avenue" lifestyle, complete with a home on stilts and animal helpers.

adventure.title: Santa Fe Trail
adventure.description: In this Western epic, Errol Flynn stars as J.E.B. Stuart, and Ronald Reagan portrays George Custer. The film dramatizes their military careers leading up to the Civil War, focusing on their opposition to the abolitionist John Brown (Raymond Massey).

adventure.title: Jungle Book
adventure.description: A live-action adaptation of Rudyard Kipling’s stories, this film follows a young boy raised by wolves in the Indian jungle. The movie captures his adventures and encounters with wild animals. It’s a classic family adventure with early jungle movie charm.

adventure.title: Sherlock Holmes Dressed to Kill
adventure.description: Holmes and Watson investigate a series of mysterious murders linked to a stolen gem. Classic detective work and suspense unfold as they chase the cunning killer. A solid entry in the Sherlock Holmes series starring Basil Rathbone.

adventure.title: Hell Ship Mutiny
adventure.description: A gripping adventure where a ship’s crew stages a dangerous mutiny at sea, facing fierce battles and survival challenges. Action-packed and tense, it showcases loyalty and betrayal on the high seas.

adventure.title: The Iron Mask
adventure.description: A silent swashbuckler where Douglas Fairbanks returns as dashing d’Artagnan to rescue the young King Louis XIV from political conspiracies. Packed with sword fights and adventure, it’s a classic Musketeer tale.

adventure.title: The Snows of Kilimanjaro
adventure.description: A writer stranded in Africa reflects on his life, loves, and regrets as he faces a fatal infection. A dramatic exploration of lost dreams and redemption, based on Hemingway’s story.

animation.title: Frozen II
animation.description: A fearless queen ventures into an enchanted forest to uncover the truth behind her powers and save her kingdom.

animation.title: Kung Fu Panda 2
animation.description: A fearless panda warrior confronts his mysterious past while battling a villainous peacock bent on conquering China with a deadly new weapon.

animation.title: Spies In Disguise
animation.description: A suave super spy is accidentally turned into a pigeon and must team up with a nerdy scientist to save the world in an unexpected way.

biographical.title: Born to Win
biographical.description: A heroin‑addicted ex‑hairdresser in gritty 1970s Times Square resorts to petty crime and betrayal to feed his habit only to see his world unravel as addiction, guilt, and moral decay close in.

biographical.title: The Joe Louis Story
biographical.description: A biographical film depicting the life and boxing career of legendary heavyweight champion Joe Louis.

biographical.title: The Jackie Robinson Story
biographical.description: A biographical film in which Jackie Robinson portrays himself, chronicling his historic journey as the first African American to break Major League Baseball’s color barrier.

biographical.title: Regeneration
biographical.description: A silent crime drama regarded as the first full-length gangster film, portraying a young man’s struggle to escape a life of poverty and crime.

cartoon.title: Atom Ant
cartoon.description: A pint‑sized superhero ant uses super speed, strength, and flight—catching crooks and thwarting villains like Dr. Crankenshaft and Ferocious Flea. A classic Hanna-Barbera crime‑fighting cartoon.

cartoon.title: High Lander
cartoon.description: Set in a post-apocalyptic 27th century, young Quentin MacLeod—mentored by Ramirez—battles Immortals to learn ancient knowledge and seek justice. Based on the Highlander mythos.

cartoon.title: Hong Kong Phoey
cartoon.description: Mild-mannered janitor Penry “Hong Kong Phooey” Pooch becomes a bumbling kung-fu crimefighter—typically saved by his cat sidekick, Spot. Silly, charming superhero spoof.

cartoon.title: Young Samsons Goliath
cartoon.description: Teen Samson and his dog Goliath transform into superheroes to fight monsters and evil scientists—sometimes battling island monsters or aliens.

cartoon.title: Barney Bear
cartoon.description: A sleepy, peace-loving bear navigates minor mishaps—hibernation frustrations, meddling plants, visiting cousins—in a series of MGM animated shorts.

cartoon.title: Superman
cartoon.description: A film series following Christopher Reeve as the iconic superhero, spanning his battles for justice from Superman: The Movie through Superman IV: The Quest for Peace.

cartoon.title: Tom and Jerry Comedy Show
cartoon.description: Filmation’s revival of the classic cat-and-mouse duo includes new slapstick antics and Droopy segments, though animation is notably limited.

cartoon.title: Top Cat
cartoon.description: Top Cat (T.C.) leads his alley cat gang in New York, pulling off get‑rich‑quick schemes while eluding the hapless Officer Dibble. Clever, comedic, and a cult favorite in Latin America.

cartoon.title: Yogi Bear
cartoon.description: Yogi, the “smarter than the average bear” from Jellystone Park, constantly schemes to steal picnic baskets—ending up in mischief with Ranger Smith.

cartoon.title: Lippy the Lion Hardy Har Har
Jonny Quest
cartoon.description: A boy joins his scientist father on global adventures, facing spies, robots, and creatures.

cartoon.title: Steamboat Willie
cartoon.description: Mickey Mouse’s debut, where he captains a steamboat and causes mischief with music and animals.

cartoon.title: The Great Grape Ape Show
cartoon.description: A cartoon adventure featuring a lovable, oversized ape and his comedic encounters (may refer to The Great Grape Ape Show, 1975).

comedy.title: Brideless Groom
comedy.description: Shemp must marry fast to inherit a fortune, causing Stooge chaos.

comedy.title: My Man Godfrey
comedy.description: A socialite hires a homeless man as a butler, only to discover he has a mysterious past.

comedy.title: His Girl Friday
comedy.description: A reporter is drawn back into journalism by her ex-husband with a scoop too good to ignore.

comedy.title: All The Way Boys
comedy.description: Two adventurers fly cargo planes in South America and get into comical situations involving gangsters and smugglers.

comedy.title: Bringing Up Baby
comedy.description: A paleontologist gets caught up in zany adventures with a quirky heiress and her pet leopard named Baby.

comedy.title: Beat The Devil
comedy.description: A group of shady characters plan a uranium deal in Africa, but nothing goes according to plan.

comedy.title: Jack and the Beanstalk
comedy.description: In this family-friendly comedy, Abbott and Costello portray bumbling characters who are hired to babysit a mischievous boy named Donald. To lull him to sleep, they attempt to read the classic fairy tale of Jack and the Beanstalk, but fall asleep themselves.

comedy.title: Meet John Doe
comedy.description: A reporter's fake story about a man planning suicide sparks a nationwide movement. A homeless man is hired to impersonate "John Doe," becoming a symbol of protest. As the movement grows, so does its manipulation by powerful interests, leading to a poignant climax.

comedy.title: My Dear Secretary
comedy.description: Aspiring writer Stephanie "Steve" Gaylord becomes the secretary to best-selling novelist Owen Waterbury, only to discover his chaotic lifestyle and playboy tendencies.

crime.title: The Asphalt Jungle
crime.description: A film noir classic showcasing a tense jewel heist gone wrong, with a deep dive into the criminal underworld.

crime.title: Four Robbers
crime.description: A group of martial artists plan and execute a robbery, but internal conflict threatens their success. (Less known, assumed data)

crime.title: Kansas City Confidential
crime.description: A gripping crime noir about a man wrongly accused of robbery who sets out to uncover the real culprits.

crime.title: And Then There Were None
crime.description: A classic crime mystery film based on Agatha Christie’s best-selling novel. Ten strangers are invited to a remote island, only to be mysteriously killed one by one, as dark secrets from their pasts resurface.

crime.title: Doomed to Die
crime.description: A tenacious detective and a plucky reporter join forces to clear the fiancé of a murdered shipping tycoon, plunging into a web of smuggling and betrayal

crime.title: Mr Wong in Chinatown
crime.description: Detective James Lee Wong investigates the murder of Princess Lin Hwa, who is killed by a poisoned dart in his home. The case leads him into a complex web of espionage and forgery involving Chinese military secrets.

crime.title: Impact
crime.description: After surviving a botched murder attempt orchestrated by his wife and her lover, millionaire Walter Williams hides in a small town. When he returns to clear his name, he faces a new challenge: his wife accuses him of plotting the murder

crime.title: Too Late for Tears
crime.description: A ruthless woman finds a suitcase of $60,000 dropped into her car and will do anything even murder to keep it.

crime.title: The Saint Louis Bank Robbery
crime.description: A washed-up college dropout becomes the getaway driver in a St. Louis bank heist, but as his ex-girlfriend senses trouble, the job descends into paranoia, betrayal, and real‑time disaster

crime.title: The Swap
crime.description: A crime drama about a man investigating his brother’s mysterious murder, uncovering secrets and betrayal along the way.

documentary.title: The Black Godfather
documentary.description: Chronicles the life and influence of music executive Clarence Avant, who shaped Black culture and business.

drama.title: Broken Strings
drama.description: A classical violinist is forced to adjust his expectations when his son prefers swing music.

drama.title: Key Largo
drama.description: A man faces off with gangsters during a hurricane at a Florida hotel.

drama.title: Salt of the Earth
drama.description: Mexican-American miners and their families strike for better conditions in New Mexico.

drama.title: Suddenly
drama.description: A hired assassin takes a family hostage while waiting to kill the President.

drama.title: The Stranger
drama.description: A war crimes investigator tracks a Nazi hiding in small-town America.

drama.title: The Emperor Jones
drama.description: A Pullman porter escapes prison and rises to power as emperor of a Caribbean island, but is haunted by guilt.

drama.title: The Woman In Brown
drama.description: A lawyer uncovers a Nazi conspiracy involving forged documents and murder.

drama.title: Danger Flight
drama.description: Tailspin Tommy Tompkins, a daring pilot, braves a severe storm to deliver a payroll. Along the way, he crosses paths with crooks plotting to steal the money.

drama.title: Penny Serenade
drama.description: A devoted couple—played by Cary Grant and Irene Dunne—face heartbreak after a miscarriage prevents them from having children. They adopt a daughter, only to suffer further tragedy, testing the strength of their love.

drama.title: Within Our Gates
drama.description: Sylvia Landry, a determined young Black woman, travels North to raise funds for a struggling school for impoverished Black children in the Deep South. Along the way, she faces personal betrayal, falls in love with a socially conscious doctor, and confronts the trauma of her past

drama.title: Jailbait
drama.description: A gangster coerces a plastic surgeon to give him a new face after a heist goes awry—leading to a deadly masquerade and moral unraveling.

drama.title: A Fool There Was Silent
drama.description: A silent drama that introduced the iconic “vamp” character, telling the story of a man’s downfall after falling under a femme fatale’s spell.

martial-arts.title: Return of the Street Fighter
martial-arts.description: Sonny Chiba’s tough-as-nails assassin takes on a deadly crime syndicate.

martial-arts.title: Ninja Death 1
martial-arts.description: A young fighter uncovers his mysterious past while battling deadly ninjas and ruthless enemies.

martial-arts.title: Ninja Death 2
martial-arts.description: The hero’s journey as he faces deadlier ninjas and uncovers darker secrets about his origins.

martial-arts.title: Lady Whirlwind
martial-arts.description: Angela Mao plays a fierce woman seeking vengeance against the man who wronged her sister.

martial-arts.title: Black Belt Jones
martial-arts.description: A martial arts expert battles mobsters to save a karate school from being taken over.

martial-arts.title: Sister Street Fighter
martial-arts.description: A fearless woman fights her way through a criminal underworld to rescue her kidnapped brother.

martial-arts.title: The Big Boss
martial-arts.description: A man moves to Thailand for work and must fight corruption and violence after discovering a drug trafficking ring.

martial-arts.title: Fist of Fury
martial-arts.description: A martial arts student seeks revenge for his master's murder, challenging the Japanese occupiers in Shanghai.

martial-arts.title: The Way Of The Dragon
martial-arts.description: A martial artist from Hong Kong helps relatives fight against gangsters in Rome and duels a master in the Colosseum.

martial-arts.title: The Guy With The Secret Kung Fu
martial-arts.description: A martial arts film filled with action, brotherhood, and classic kung fu storytelling.

musical.title: Stormy Weather
musical.description: A World War I veteran turned dancer reflects on his rise in show business and his love for singer Selina Rogers. The film showcases performances by Lena Horne, Bill Robinson, and other African American artists of the era. Notably, it features the iconic "Jumpin' Jive" dance sequence by the Nicholas Brothers.

musical.title: Royal Wedding
musical.description: In this charming MGM musical, sibling dance duo Tom and Ellen Bowen (Fred Astaire and Jane Powell) travel to London to perform during the 1947 royal wedding festivities.

mystery.title: Texas Terror
mystery.description: A rancher and lawman join forces to uncover a rustling gang.

mystery.title: Sabotage
mystery.description: A cinema owner is involved in a terrorist plot and his wife suspects him.

mystery.title: The Kennel Murder Case
mystery.description: Detective Philo Vance solves a locked-room mystery involving a dead dog breeder.

mystery.title: Rear Window
mystery.description: A wheelchair-bound photographer believes he has witnessed a murder in a neighboring apartment.

mystery.title: The Lady Vanishes
mystery.description: A woman disappears on a train, and her fellow passenger is the only one who believes it — a classic Hitchcock mystery.

mystery.title: The Second Woman
mystery.description: A grieving architect living in a dramatic cliff top home is plagued by a string of sinister accidents, a perceptive neighbor suspects sabotage and steps in to help unravel the mystery.

mystery.title: Mr Wong Detective
mystery.description: When a chemical company owner fears for his life, private detective James Lee Wong discovers a locked-room murder by poison gas, leading him to unravel a web of corporate greed and foreign espionage.

mystery.title: The Mystery of Mr Wong
mystery.description: A star sapphire dubbed The Eye of the Daughter of the Moon is stolen from China and triggers a deadly murder at a social gathering. Detective James Lee Wong (Boris Karloff) must navigate a maze of red herrings to expose the killer and recover the cursed gem.

romance.title: Charade
romance.description: A widow is pursued in Paris by several men trying to recover a fortune her late husband may have stolen.

romance.title: The Amazing Adventure
romance.description: In this British romantic comedy, Cary Grant stars as Ernest Bliss, a wealthy young man who bets his doctor that he can live for a year without touching his inheritance. Taking on various jobs and experiencing life as an ordinary person, he learns valuable lessons about love and humility.

sci-fi.title: Assignment Outer Space
sci-fi.description: A reporter in space uncovers a plot to destroy Earth.

sci-fi.title: First Spaceship on Venus
sci-fi.description: An international crew investigates a strange signal from Venus, discovering a dead civilization.

sci-fi.title: Incredible Shrinking Man
sci-fi.description: After exposure to a mysterious mist, a man begins shrinking uncontrollably.

sci-fi.title: Last Woman on Earth
sci-fi.description: Three survivors emerge from a diving trip to find all life on Earth gone.

sci-fi.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
sci-fi.description: An alien arrives on Earth with a warning about mankind's violent ways.

sci-fi.title: The Incredible Petrified World
sci-fi.description: A team of explorers find a hidden world beneath the ocean.

sci-fi.title: The Lost World
sci-fi.description: An expedition to a South American plateau finds living dinosaurs.

sci-fi.title: Star Odyssey
sci-fi.description: Earth’s heroes battle a powerful alien robot army threatening to enslave humanity.

sci-fi.title: Doomsday Machine
sci-fi.description: Astronauts race to survive after Earth is destroyed by a secret nuclear weapon.

sci-fi.title: Glass
sci-fi.description: A disturbed man with multiple personalities becomes the key to a showdown between a vigilante with super strength and a mastermind who believes in the power of the extraordinary.

sci-fi.title: Brother from Another Planet
sci-fi.description: A mute alien with human appearance crashes in Harlem and faces both wonder and pursuit by men in black.

sci-fi.title: Cosmos War of the Planets
sci-fi.description: In this Italian sci-fi film, Captain Alex Hamilton investigates a mysterious signal and UFO sightings over Antarctica, leading to the discovery of a giant robot enslaving humanoids on an unknown planet. The crew's mission to confront this threat escalates into a battle for Earth's survival.

sci-fi.title: Teenagers from Outer Space
sci-fi.description: A young alien named Derek rebels against his species' plan to use Earth as a breeding ground for giant lobsters called Gargons. He befriends a teenage Earth girl, Betty, and together they attempt to thwart the invasion, facing challenges from both alien and human adversaries.

sci-fi.title: The Phantom Planet
sci-fi.description: A sci-fi film about an astronaut who crash-lands on a mysterious asteroid, where he shrinks in size and becomes involved in an interplanetary conflict between its tiny inhabitants and hostile alien invaders.

sci-fi.title: Voyage to the Planet of Prehistoric Women
sci-fi.description: Male astronauts land on Venus, unaware they are being watched by telepathic, prehistoric women who view them as intruders.

sci-fi.title: Unknown World
sci-fi.description: Scientists venture deep underground in search of a safe haven for humanity, only to discover perilous dangers beneath the Earth’s surface.

sci-fi.title: The Amazing Transparent Man
sci-fi.description: A criminal becomes part of an experiment that renders him invisible, leading to a dangerous plot involving espionage and crime.

sci-fi.title: Rocket ship XM
sci-fi.description: A mission to the Moon goes off course, sending astronauts to Mars, where they discover the tragic remnants of a destroyed civilization.

sci-fi.title: Cat Women of the Moon
sci-fi.description: A crew of astronauts encounters a hidden society of telepathic women on the Moon, who plan to use them to escape their dying world.

thriller.title: Hitch Hiker
thriller.description: Two friends are kidnapped by a psychotic hitchhiker while on a fishing trip.

thriller.title: Million Dollar Weekend
thriller.description: A man steals from his company, gets entangled with a woman, and tries to escape abroad.

thriller.title: Scarlet Street
thriller.description: A meek man is duped by a femme fatale and her lover, leading to tragedy.

thriller.title: Vertigo
thriller.description: A retired detective is hired to follow a woman behaving strangely, only to become obsessed with her.

thriller.title: The Fatal Hour
thriller.description: When a police officer is found murdered in the San Francisco Bay, Captain Street enlists detective James Lee Wong and reporter Bobbie Logan to uncover a gem-smuggling ring and expose the killer.

thriller.title: Quicksand
thriller.description: An auto mechanic, desperate to impress a blonde cashier, embezzles $20 and finds himself sinking deeper into crime from petty theft to blackmail and murder in a fast‑spirited descent into noir.

thriller.title: The Woman in Green
thriller.description: Sherlock Holmes investigates a string of London murders where each victim’s forefinger is mysteriously removed, uncovering a hypnotic blackmail scheme tied to his arch-nemesis, Professor Moriarty.

war.title: A Farewell to Arms
war.description: Set during World War I, this adaptation of Ernest Hemingway’s novel follows American ambulance driver Lt. Frederic Henry (Gary Cooper) and British nurse Catherine Barkley (Helen Hayes) as they fall in love amidst the chaos of war. Their relationship faces numerous challenges, including wartime separation and personal loss.

western.title: One Eyed Jacks
western.description: A betrayed outlaw seeks revenge on his former partner, now a sheriff.

western.title: Outlaw
western.description: A tale of Billy the Kidâ€™s friendship and conflict with Doc Holliday, with romantic entanglements.

western.title: Apache Blood
western.description: A native American warrior seeks revenge against the U.S. soldiers who massacred his tribe.

western.title: McClintock
western.description: A wealthy rancher tries to maintain peace in his turbulent family and town amid social and generational conflict.

western.title: Vengeance Valley
western.description: A man raised by a rancher clashes with his foster brother when betrayal and jealousy erupt.

western.title: The Big Trees
western.description: An adventure drama starring Kirk Douglas as a greedy lumberman whose clash with Quaker settlers leads to a battle over California’s giant redwoods.

tv-series.title: Dragnet 1951
tv-series.description: Sergeant Joe Friday and his partners deliver methodical, case-by-case crime-solving based on real LAPD procedures. The show is famed for its deadpan realism.

tv-series.title: HillStreet Blues
tv-series.description: Gritty, serialized police drama following officers at a chaotic city precinct. It's known for its ensemble cast, overlapping storylines, and emotional realism.

tv-series.title: The Beverly Hill Billies
tv-series.description: The Clampett family strikes oil in the Ozarks, moves to upscale Beverly Hills, and brings their rural humor to polite society. A classic sitcom about culture clash and simple wisdom.

tv-series.title: The Ironside
tv-series.description: After being paralyzed by a sniper, former chief Robert Ironside becomes a tough, wheelchair-bound consultant solving San Francisco cases with his team.

tv-series.title: Mister ED
tv-series.description: Talking horse Mister Ed shares wisecracks only with his owner Wilbur Post. Their daily barnyard interactions spark domestic humor and neighborhood gossip.

tv-series.title: The Andy Griffiths Show
tv-series.description: Sheriff Andy Taylor peacefully runs Mayberry alongside his bumbling deputy Barney Fife, Aunt Bee, and son Opie. A warm, idealized slice-of-life sitcom.

tv-series.title: Ultraman
tv-series.description: A groundbreaking Japanese sci-fi TV series where a giant alien superhero defends Earth from monstrous threats.

tv-series.title: World War II
tv-series.description: A historical documentary series presenting vivid, colorized World War II footage with expert narration.
